help.desc: This command uses points to this page.

spawn.desc: This command spawns a specific mob at player coordinates
spawn.details: Replace <mob> with any given entity found here:

dropit.desc: Makes the player drop the item in the left hand

anvil.desc: Drops random anvils around the player

diamonds.desc: Drop a random amount of diamonds

panicsound.desc: Emits a loud sound that scares the player
panicsound.details: This command is not shown on screen

treecage.desc: Spawns a tree on the player location to jail the player

speedy.details: May be an awesome combo with 'neverfall'

heal.details: This command lasts 20 in-game ticks (usually 1 second), during this time the player may be immortal

hungry.desc: Sets the player in a hungry status

wallhack.desc: The player will be able to see all the mobs around itself for a limited amount of time

superman.desc: Gives a stupid amount of HPs to the player
superman.details: Can be countered with the command 'normalman'

normalman.desc: Sets the player on a normal amount of HPs

water.desc: Places a block of water on the player location
water.details: Works in the nether as well

woollify.desc: Everything around the player will be swapped to wool

randomblock.desc: Drops a random block close to the player
randomblock.details: May be ANY obtainable/unobtainable block in all minecraft

neverfall.desc: Spawns a block below the player at all time
neverfall.details: Useful if used with speedy to travel long distances with ease

armored.desc: Gives the player full Netherite armor and sword

tothenether.desc: Teleports the player to the Nether

totheoverworld.desc: Teleports the player to the Overworld

bob.desc: Spawns the famous yet infamous bob

nukemobs.desc: Nukes all the entities around the player, no discriminations.

dinnerbone.desc: Applies the 'dinnerbone' nametag to all the entities around the player

craftingtable.desc: Did u ask for a crafting table?

ihaveit.desc: Adds the block pointed by the player in the inventory, 1 per tick.

paint.desc: Player will be able to draw anywhere.

goingdown.desc: Simple yet powerful command to remove blocks below the player
goingdown.details: Useful in combo with the 'treecage' command

clearchunk.desc: One of my favourite commands so far.

thatistnt.desc: Turns the block that the player is facing into primed tnt

tunneltime.desc: Time to dig, just wait a sec

openspace.desc: Feeling a bit claustrophobic? I got you.

upsidedown.desc: Land below the player will be mirrored above it but upside down

onthemoon.desc: Player will be able to jump higher and fall slower

cookies.desc: Drops a random amount of cookies around the player

supertools.desc: Adds powerful tools to the player inventory

milk.desc: Gives the player a bucket of milk, useful in case of poison

potion.desc: Adds a random potion effect to the player

lava.desc: Spawns a block of lava at the player position

bees.desc: Spawns a bunch of angry bees

endframe.desc: Spawns an endframe portal around the player

laserview.desc: Deletes the block the player is looking at

goldensword.desc: Gives the player a golden sword

goldenhoe.desc: Gives the player a golden hoe
